parameters.definition: Minimum required protein in grams per worker
Minimum required carbohydrates in grams per worker
Protein provided by one hamburger in grams
Carbohydrates provided by one hamburger in grams
Calories provided by one chicken wrap
Protein provided by one chicken wrap in grams
Carbohydrates provided by one chicken wrap in grams

description: A car manufacturing company makes hamburgers and chicken wraps for workers. They need to ensure workers get at least \param{C} calories, \param{P} grams of protein, and \param{Cr} grams of carbs. One hamburger costs \param{HamburgerCost} and contains \param{HamburgerCalories} calories, \param{HamburgerProtein} grams of protein, and \param{HamburgerCarbs} grams of carbs. One chicken wrap costs \param{WrapCost} and contains \param{WrapCalories} calories, \param{WrapProtein} grams of protein, and \param{WrapCarbs} grams of carbs. What is the minimum cost diet that the company can provide for its workers?
